Help.Description:
The tab command will add the completionword to your tab completion list. When pressing the 'tab' key, a search is conducted through the tab list in efforts of finding the best match.
Useful for long commands.
If tab is pressed, with no tabs defined, a scrollback buffer will be used to look for matches.
Help.Example: Typing mu, followed by pressing tab would make this diabolic command appear.
Help.Notes: Remove tabs with the untab command.
